title: Omar's Portfolio
passionateAbout: Bringing ideas to life through smart design and Flutter magic
aboutMeContent: I'm a Flutter developer passionate about crafting mobile apps that blend simplicity with elegance. I believe every detail in the user experience matters, so I pay close attention to everything—from colors and typography to smooth animations and seamless interactions. Thanks to Flutter, I’ve been able to build cross-platform apps with high efficiency and consistent quality. I love working on projects that add real value, and I’m always looking to grow and be part of teams that create meaningful impact. And if your project needs a gentle touch and a UI that makes users smile… I’m in!
